trans-unit.source: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ is an open source (GPLv2) Linux systems management solution. Below are some links that should prove useful if you have any questions regarding your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ server.
trans-unit.target: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 是個開源式的（GPLv2）Linux 系統管理解決方案。如果您有任何 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 伺服器上的問題，以下一些連結對您應該會有所幫助。

trans-unit.source: For details on @@PRODUCT_NAME@@, please visit our web-site at http://spacewalk.redhat.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需取得 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 上的詳情，請參閱我們的支援網站 http://spacewalk.redhat.com。

trans-unit.source: For details on interacting with the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ community, please visit us at http://spacewalk.redhat.com/communicate.html.
trans-unit.target: 如欲取得有關於和 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 社群互動上的詳情，請參閱我們的網站 http://spacewalk.redhat.com/communicate.html。

trans-unit.source: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ is a complete systems management platform for Linux. It's built on open standards and uses a simple, Internet-based graphical interface. It also features a modular design--as networks grow, administrators can add enhanced capabilities for system updates, management, and monitoring of their entire infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 是個 Linux 的完整系統管理平台。它架構於開放式標準，並使用簡單、以網際網路為基礎的圖形界面。它也支援模組化的設計 -- 隨著網路持續成長，管理員能對整個架構進行系統更新、管理、以及監控等動作。

trans-unit.source: Red Hat currently features three @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ modules:
trans-unit.target: Red Hat 目前提供了三個 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 模組：

trans-unit.source: Update: Easy software updates to your Red Hat systems.
trans-unit.target: 升級：輕鬆升級的您的 Red Hat 系統。

trans-unit.source: Management: Increased management capabilities and scalability of your Linux deployment.
trans-unit.target: 管理：為建置 Linux 提供更精進的管理功能與可擴充性。

trans-unit.source: Provisioning: System snapshots, integrated kickstarts, configuration management and more.
trans-unit.target: Provisioning：系統快照、整合的 kickstarts、設定管理等等。
了解 RHN 的更多資訊

trans-unit.source: Note: If you are having SSL connection issues when connecting to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@, ensure that you are using the latest versions of up2date (Enterprise Linux 4 and below) or yum (Enterprise Linux 5 and higher) and rhn_register.
trans-unit.target: 請注意：如果您在連接 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 時，有 SSL 連線的問題，請確認您使用的是 最新版 的 up2date（Enterprise Linux 4 或以下）或 yum（Enterprise Linux 5 或以上）和 rhn_register。

trans-unit.source: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ offers email notifications for when errata relevant to your systems are released, as well as daily emails summarizing the events for your systems.
trans-unit.target: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 會在與您系統相關的勘誤釋出時，以電子郵件通知您；或以日報表電子郵件提醒您。

trans-unit.source: This controls how many entries, like systems, would be displayed per page in a list context.
trans-unit.target: 跟系統一樣，這會控制每頁清單中會列出多少項目。

trans-unit.source: A task-oriented menu of quick links to different areas of the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ user interface.
trans-unit.target: 任務導向的選單，讓您可以快速的連接到不同領域的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 使用者介面。

trans-unit.source:
The Demo entitlement is a free system entitlement that was granted with each new @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ (RHN) account. The Demo system entitlement is only intended to be used when subscribing an Red Hat Linux (end of life) system to RHN. Red Hat Linux maintenance and errata support ended April 30, 2004. Red Hat no longer grants Demo system entitlements to new RHN accounts.

The Demo Entitlement can not be used with Red Hat Enterprise Linux will be removed at a later date. Inactive systems associated with the Demo entitlements will be unentitled. An inactive system is a system that uses a Demo entitlement but has not checked in the past 30 days.
trans-unit.target:
示範（Demo）權利是免費的系統權利，並授與每個新的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@（RHN）帳號使用。示範權利只是用來將 Red Hat Linux（壽命終止）系統訂閱至 RHN 用。Red Hat Linux 的維護與勘誤支援已經在 2004 年四月卅日到期。Red Hat 不再為新的 RHN 帳號授與新的示範權利。

無法應用於 Red Hat Enterprise Linux 的示範權利將在之後被移除掉。與這示範權利相聯的非運作中系統之所有權利也將被移除。非運作中的系統是指使用示範權利，但在過去卅天內沒有登入的系統。

trans-unit.source: Configure your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ below. The HTTP proxy settings are for the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ server's communication with the parent @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ server, if any. The http proxy should be of the form: hostname:port, but a default port of 8080 will be used if none is provided. HTTP proxy settings for clients' systems to connect to this @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ can be different, and will be configured later. If you enable the Monitoring Backend, you should also enable Monitoring Scout, or configure the Monitoring Scout as a separate server. If you enable the Monitoring Scout, you must also enable the Monitoring Backend.
trans-unit.target: 請在下方設定您的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@。HTTP 代理設定是給 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 伺服器和父 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 伺服器進行通訊用的（若使用情況為此的話）。HTTP 代理必須使用「主機名稱:連接埠」這個格式，但如果您不設定連接埠的話，系統將會使用預設的 8080 通訊埠。用戶端系統連上此 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 上的 HTTP 代理設定可以是不同的，並能在稍後設定。若您啟用了「監控後端（Monitoring Backend）」，您也應該啟用「監控偵測（Monitoring Scout）」，或將「監控偵測」設置為一台獨立的伺服器。如果您啟用了「監控偵測」的話，您也必須啟用「監控後端」。

trans-unit.source: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ allows for the creation of multiple 'organizations' on a @@PRODUCT_NAME@@.
trans-unit.target: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 能讓您在一台 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 上建立多個 「組織」。

trans-unit.source: Organizations are a way to place boundaries between sets of systems, system groups, software channels, subscriptions and entitlements, kickstart profiles, activation keys, configuration channels and files, users - everything you manage using @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. Each organization is managed by at least one organization administrator, and the entire @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ is managed by a @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ administrator. The organizations on one @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ with multiple organizations function similarly to the organizations on multiple @@PRODUCT_NAME@@s with one organization.
trans-unit.target: 組織是個設定系統、系統 群組、軟體頻道、訂閱與權利、kickstart 設定檔、 啟動金鑰、設定頻道與檔案、使用者界線的方式 - 任何 您使用 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 來管理的東西。每個組織都由至少 一個組織管理員所管理，並且整個 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 都是由一名 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 的 管理員所管理。一台擁有多個組織功能的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 上的 組織，跟擁有一個組織的多台 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 上的組織 相仿。

trans-unit.source: There are currently no kickstart ip ranges associated for any of your organization's kickstart profiles.
trans-unit.target: 目前沒有任何 kickstart IP 位址與您組織的 kickstart 檔相關。

trans-unit.source: If selected, all output of custom post scripts will be logged to /root/ks-post.log.
trans-unit.target: 如果選擇的話，所有自訂 post script 的輸出都會紀錄到 /root/ks-post.log 中。

trans-unit.source: If selected, all output of pre scripts will be logged to /root/ks-pre.log.
trans-unit.target: 若選擇的話，所有 pre script 的輸出都會被紀錄到 /root/ks-pre.log 中。

trans-unit.source: If selected, ks.cfg and all %include fragments will be copied to /root.
trans-unit.target: 若選擇的話，ks.cfg 和所有 %include 片段都會被複製至 /root 中。

trans-unit.source: This kickstart profile may be edited using the form provided below. Entries marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
trans-unit.target: 您可以用以下表單修改 kickstart 設定檔。標示為星號（*）的欄位是必填的欄位。

trans-unit.source:
Are you sure you want to delete this Kickstart?

WARNING: deleting this kickstart will remove its corresponding options and scripts.

Please click the button only once; it will take a few moments for the deletion process to complete.
trans-unit.target:
您確定要刪除這個 kickstart？

警告：刪除這個 kickstart 會移除相關系統與選項。

請按下按鈕一次；刪除過程會花上一點時間。

trans-unit.source: The Organization Default Profile setting can be used with manually-created or bare-metal kickstart files. Select this option to indicate which profile in your Organization is used when the URL from this link is specified in the ks=<URL> section of your kickstart file. The link will not work unless an Organization Default is specified.
trans-unit.target: 「組織預設設定檔」的設定可以與手動建立或空機的 kickstart 檔案一起使用。請選擇這個選項，指出當這個連結在 kickstart 檔案的 ks=<URL> 段落中，要用哪一個設定檔。這連結只有在組織預設值指定後才會發生作用。

trans-unit.source: You cannot kickstart a system registered to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ using an inactive kickstart profile. However, the kickstart files for inactive kickstart profiles are still available for manual download and may be used for bare metal kickstarts.
trans-unit.target: 您不能透過非作用中的 kickstart 設定檔來 kickstart 已向 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 註冊的系統。然而，非作用中的 kickstart 設定檔的 kickstart 檔案還是可以用作手動下載，以及空機 kickstart。

trans-unit.source: You may specify scripts to run during the kickstart process, either before (pre-kickstart) or after (post-kickstart) the operating system installation starts. These scripts are useful for tasks such as setting up NFS mounts, moving files before installation, turning services on, or adding users after installation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定 kickstart 進行時要執行的 script，時間可以是 kickstart 安裝作業系統之前或之後。這些 script 對一些工作，例如掛載 NFS、在安裝前移動檔案、啟動服務、或在安裝之後新增使用者等等，會非常有用。

trans-unit.source: You may view or edit the scripts for this kickstart below. You may add a new script using the add new kickstart script button above to the right.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在下方檢視或編輯這個 kickstart 的 script。您可以使用右下方的按鈕，增加新的 kickstart script。

trans-unit.source: No scripts are associated with this kickstart profile
trans-unit.target: 沒有與這個 kickstart 設定檔相關連的 script

trans-unit.source:
In order to kickstart "bare metal systems", you will need to provide them with a boot image that is compatible with the version of the operating system you are kickstarting to via boot CD.

Once these systems have booted using the appropriate image, you will need to provide a kickstart file. You may use the following URL in your Boot CD or in your PXE configuration to provide these systems with the kickstart file associated with this kickstart profile:
trans-unit.target:
為了要 kickstart「全新的系統」，您需要提供一份開機映像檔，相容於您透過開機光碟所 kickstart 的版本。

一旦這些系統使用正確的映像檔啟動後，您還需要提供 kickstart 檔案。您可以使用您開機光碟或 PXE 設定中的以下網址，為這些系統提供與這 kickstart 設定檔相關的 kickstart 檔案：

trans-unit.source: Resource: The RHN Reference Guide Kickstart section
Tip: A full listing of the IP ranges associated with your organization's kickstart profiles is available
trans-unit.target: 提示：您可以找到與您組織的 kickstart 設定檔相關之完整 IP 位址清單

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you may associate each of your kickstart profiles with particular ip ranges. Then, you can provide bare metal systems with a single URL that will provide each system the kickstart file associated with its IP Address. Below you will find this URL:
trans-unit.target: 要不您可以將每個 kickstart 設定檔與特定的 IP 位址建立關聯。然後，您可以為全新的系統提供一個網址，為其 IP 位址與 kickstart 設定檔建立關聯。您可以在以下找到這網址：

trans-unit.source: IP Address-Based Bare Metal Kickstart URL
trans-unit.target: 以 IP 位址為主的全新系統之 kickstart 網址

trans-unit.source: Associated IP Ranges with Kickstart Profile
trans-unit.target: 將 IP 位址範圍與 kickstart 設定檔建立關聯

trans-unit.source: You may add or delete IP ranges associated with this kickstart profile below:
trans-unit.target: 您可以自以下 kickstart 設定檔新增或移除 IP 位址範圍：

trans-unit.source: The following IP Address ranges are associated with kickstart profiles.
trans-unit.target: 以下 IP 位址範圍與 kickstart 設定檔相聯。

trans-unit.source: You may wish to modify the following options for special-case kickstart scenarios. We recommend consulting the Red Hat Enterprise Linux System Administration Guide for detailed documentation of all of these options.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為特定的 kickstart 環境，修改以下選項。我們建議您參考《Red Hat Enterprise Linux 系統管理指南》，其中包含了所有這些選項的詳細文件。

trans-unit.source: Tip: The label field should not be easily guessable, since it could be used to expose information about this kickstart profile to a 3rd party.
trans-unit.target: 提示：這標籤欄位不應該被容易猜出來，因為它會曝露關於本設定檔的資訊給第三方。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Changing the Virtualization Type may require changes to the kickstart profile's bootloader and partition options, potentially overwriting user customizations. Please visit the Partitioning tab to verify the new settings.
trans-unit.target: 請注意：若要更改虛擬化類型，您可能需要修改 kickstart 設定檔的 bootloader 和分割區選項，並將用戶自訂化覆寫。 請至 磁碟分割 分頁來驗證新的設定。

trans-unit.source: Each kickstart file you upload to satellite will need a label so that you can refer to it later - please choose a label for this kickstart and enter it below. Entries marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
trans-unit.target: 您所上傳至衛星伺服器的各個 kickstart 檔案都需要一個標籤，如此一來您之後便可參照該檔案 - 請為此 kickstart 選擇一個標籤並將它輸入於下方。標有了星號（*）的項目代表需輸入的項目。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can upload a new version in the '{0}' section below and select '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: 另外，您能夠在下方的「{0}」部份中上傳一個新的版本並選擇「{1}」。

trans-unit.source: You can associate one or more activation keys with this kickstart profile. Activation keys will allow systems kickstarted with this profile to automatically register to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@, gain @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ service level entitlements, subscribe to specified software and configuration channels, and subscribe to specified system groups. Activation keys can also specify packages to be installed on a system. Please consider how this may affect your package selection in this profile's Software tab.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為這個 kickstart 設定檔設定一或多個啟動金鑰。啟動金鑰能讓利用這設定檔 kickstart 的系統，自動向 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 註冊，取得 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服務等級的權利、訂閱特定的軟體並設定頻道、同時訂閱特定的系統群組。啟動金鑰也可以指定要安裝到系統的套件。請在設定檔的軟體分頁中，看看這將會如何影響您的套件選擇。
找不到可用的啟動金鑰

trans-unit.source: Note: The selection of incompatible activation keys can prevent a system from registering properly after it is kickstarted. You'll want to review the RHN Reference Guide section on using multiple activation keys before making use of this feature.
trans-unit.target: 注意：選擇不相容的啟動金鑰會讓系統在 kickstart 之後，無法正確地註冊。您可以在使用這功能之前，檢視《RHN 參考指南》中有關使用多啟動金鑰一節。

trans-unit.source: Warning: Any child channel subscriptions associated with this profile will be overridden if any activation keys are selected above. If you wish to associate activation keys with this profile, please use an activation key to specify child channel subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: 警告： 假如選擇了上述任何的啟動金鑰，任何與此設定檔相關的子頻道訂閱都會被置換掉。 假如您希望使啟動金鑰與此設定檔相聯，請使用一組啟動金鑰來指定子頻道訂閱。

trans-unit.source: You can associate file preservation lists with this kickstart profile by selecting them below. When a system is kickstarted, any files or directories listed in the file preservation lists associated with this kickstart profile will be saved before the kickstart is performed and restored once it is complete. If you would like to create a new file preservation list, you can do so at the File Preservation tab.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在下方選擇，為檔案保留清單與 kickstart 設定檔建立關聯。當系統被 kickstart 時，檔案保留清單中，跟這個設定檔有關的所有檔案與目錄，都會在 kickstart 開始前備份，並在 kickstart 完成後復原。如果您想要建立新的檔案保留清單，請點選檔案保留分頁。
以 IP 位址來 kickstart 全新的系統
為網路介面使用靜態 IP 位址
啟用 - 強制使用 SELinux 政策

trans-unit.source: Permissive - SELinux prints warnings instead of enforcing
trans-unit.target: 警告 - SELinux 會印出警告，而不是強制使用政策
停用 - 完全停用 SELinux

trans-unit.source: Tip: Enabling this will allow you to deploy configuration files from @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ to any system that uses this kickstart profile. If you do not use @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ configuration management, it is a good security practice to leave this box unchecked. You can always enable it on individual systems later.
trans-unit.target: 提示：啟用這項功能可以讓您由 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 將設定檔建置到任何使用此 kickstart 設定檔的系統上。就安全性來說，如果您不使用 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 設定管理，建議您不要勾選此方塊。您可以在之後於每台電腦上，啟用這項功能。

trans-unit.source: Tip: Enabling this will allow you to execute commands remotely from @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ on any system that uses this profile. It is a good security practice to leave this box unchecked unless you are sure you will use the remote command feature. You can always enable it on individual systems later.
trans-unit.target: 提示：啟用這項功能可以讓您在任何使用此設定檔的系統上，由 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 執行遠端指令。就安全性來說，除非您確定您將會使用遠端指令功能，建議您不要勾選此方塊。您可以在之後於每台電腦上，啟用這功能。

trans-unit.source: A root password must be entered
trans-unit.target: 請輸入 root 的密碼

trans-unit.source: You may edit the partitions that will be created on systems kickstarted with this system below:
trans-unit.target: 您可以編輯分割區，這些分割區會在以下使用 kickstart 的系統上建立：
這將會永遠刪除這個發行套件。

trans-unit.source: No public keys or ssl certs defined.
trans-unit.target: 未定義公開金鑰或 SSL 認證。

trans-unit.source: You can refer to these keys and/or certificates in your kickstart profiles in order to install those keys/certificates on systems during a kickstart. A system will need the correct keys to install signed packages, and correct certificate to be kickstarted by an @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Proxy Server or @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Server. For more information, see the RHN Reference Guide
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 kickstart 設定檔中，參照這些金鑰與（或）認證，好在 kickstart 過程中，安裝這些金鑰/認證。系統需要正確的金鑰才可安裝經過數位簽章的套件，並修正透過 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 代理伺服器或 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 伺服器來安裝的 kickstart 認證。如欲取得更多詳情，請參閱《RHN 參考指南》。

trans-unit.source: GPG Public Keys and SSL Certificates
trans-unit.target: GPG 公開金鑰與 SSL 認證
建立新的、用以儲存的金鑰 / 認證

trans-unit.source: Please enter the information for your key in the form provided below. Entries marked with an (*) are required and must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 請在以下的表單中輸入您金鑰的資訊。用星號（*）標示的欄位為「必填」的欄位。

trans-unit.source:
Are you sure you want to delete this Key permanently?

If so please click the button once.
trans-unit.target:
您確定要永遠刪除這個金鑰？

如要刪除金鑰，請單擊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Neither a GPG or SSL Certificate is currently attached to this cryptokey. Please attach a GPG key or SSL Certificate to this crypto key using the form above.
trans-unit.target: 目前沒有任何 GPG 金鑰或 SSL 認證附加到這加密金鑰。請使用以上表單，將 GPG 金鑰或 SSL 認證，附加到這個加密金鑰上。

trans-unit.source: File preservation lists are lists of files that will be restored to a system during a particular kickstart. You can reference a file preservation list in a kickstart profile. For more information refer to the RHN Reference Guide. The following file preservation lists have been created for use by your organization:
trans-unit.target: 檔案保留清單列出了在使用特定 kickstart 安裝系統時，需要保留的檔案。您可以讓 kickstart 設定檔參照一份檔案保留清單。欲知更多詳情，請參閱《RHN 參考指南》。以下檔案保留清單已建立，以供您的組織使用：

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete the selected File List(s)? WARNING: Deleting the selected File List(s) will delete all its associated files.
trans-unit.target: 您確定要刪除所選的檔案清單嗎？警告：刪除這些檔案清單會一併刪除所有相關檔案。

trans-unit.source: There are currently no file preservation lists defined. Click the "create new file preservation list" link above to create a new list.
trans-unit.target: 目前沒有定義任何檔案保留清單。請按下上方「建立新的檔案保留清單」連結，建立新的清單。

trans-unit.source: There were no files selected for deletion
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何檔案被選取，以供刪除
建立新的檔案保留清單

trans-unit.source: Tip: Special devices like /dev/hda1 and /dev/sda1 are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 提示：不支援特殊的裝置，例如 /dev/hda1 與 /dev/sda1。

trans-unit.source: Tip: Only file and directory names may be entered. No regular expression wildcards can be included.
trans-unit.target: 提示：只能輸入檔案或目錄名稱。不能包括一般的萬用字元。
編輯 kickstart 檔案保留清單
建立 kickstart 檔案保留清單

trans-unit.source:
Any files or directories listed here will be preserved following the kickstart. List files or directories one per line.
Each list is limited to a total size of 1 MB. For more information see the RHN Reference Guide.
trans-unit.target:
本處列出的所有檔案或目錄都會在 kickstart 之後被保留。每一行代表一個檔案或目錄。
每個清單的大小限制為1 MB。欲知更多詳情，請參閱《RHN 參考指南》。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the software this kickstart profile will deploy below.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在下方修改此 kickstart 設定檔將會建置的軟體。

trans-unit.source: Tip: Changing the base channel will require you to reselect any child cannels that may be associated with this profile.
trans-unit.target: 提示：您需要重新選擇與此設定檔相關的任何子頻道才能改變基礎頻道。

trans-unit.source: No child channels found for the selected base channel
trans-unit.target: 所選擇的基礎頻道中沒有子頻道

trans-unit.source: Selected Repositories will be available in the %packages section of the kickstart file.
trans-unit.target: 選擇的軟體庫將能使用於 kickstart 檔案的 %packages 部份中。

trans-unit.source: Tip: New file location must be the root of an install tree (for the operating system version above) on either an http or ftp server.
trans-unit.target: 提示：新檔案的位置必須是（以上作業系統版本）安裝樹的根目錄，位於 http 或 ftp 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Warning: If any activation keys are associated with this kickstart profile(under the activation keys tab). the child channel subscriptions above will be overridden. In that situation please use an activation key to specify child channel subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: 警告：假如任何啟用金鑰與此 kickstart 設定檔相關（位於 啟動金鑰分頁 中），上述的子頻道訂閱就會被置換掉。在此情況下，請使用一組啟用金鑰來指定子頻道訂閱。

trans-unit.source: Tip: If your systems are connected through an @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Proxy, you may place the installation tree in /var/www/html/pub/ on the Proxy.
trans-unit.target: 提示：如果您的系統透過 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 代理伺服器連線的話，您便可將安裝樹放在代理伺服器上的 /var/www/html/pub/ 目錄中。

trans-unit.source: Below is a list of the GPG and SSL keys you have created. Selected keys will be imported during the %post section of all kickstarts scheduled using this profile.
trans-unit.target: 以下是您已經建立的 GPG 與 SSL 金鑰清單。已選取的金鑰會在使用這設定檔的 kickstart %post 排程階段匯入。

trans-unit.source: Tip: If you want clients to continue to be able to SSH into machines kickstarted with this profile without getting host key errors, it is recommended you setup a file preservation list for this profile containing the files in /etc/ssh
trans-unit.target: 提示：如果您希望用戶能繼續利用這個設定檔，藉由 SSH 連上 kickstart 的機器，而不收到主機金鑰的錯誤訊息，那麼建議您為這個設定檔建立一個檔案保留清單，包含 /etc/ssh

trans-unit.source: No keys defined. Please go here to create a new Key to use with this Profile. Selected keys will be imported during the %post section of all kickstarts scheduled using this profile.
trans-unit.target: 並未定義任何金鑰。請點選這裡，使用這設定檔建立新的金鑰。已選取的金鑰會在使用這設定檔的 kickstart %post 排程階段中匯入。

trans-unit.source:
You can edit the pre and post scripts for this kickstart below. Kickstart pre-scripts are run immediately after a kickstart file has been parsed on a system. You can access the network in this section, but you must use IP addresses (name service has not been configured at this point). For more details on kickstart pre scripts, please refer to the Red Hat Enterprise Linux System Administration Guide.

You can also edit the post script for this kickstart below. First, commands related to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ will automatically be performed (for example, esystem registration to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@). Next, the non-chroot post script will be executed, and finally the post script will be executed. For more details on kickstart post scripts, please refer to the Red Hat Enterprise Linux System Administration Guide.
trans-unit.target:
您可以在以下編輯此 kickstart 的 pre 與 post script。Kickstart pre script 會在 kickstart 設定檔由系統解讀後，馬上執行。 您可以使用這一節來存取網路，但您必須使用 IP 位址（此時名稱解析服務還未被設定）。欲取得 kickstart pre script 的 相關資訊，請參閱《Red Hat Enterprise Linux 系統管理指南》。

您亦可以在下方編輯 kickstart 的 post script。首先，與 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 有關的指令會自動執行（舉例來說，向 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 註冊系統）。 接下來，非 chroot 的 post script 將會被執行，最後則是 post script。如欲取得更多有關於 kickstart post scipt 的相關資訊，請參閱 《Red Hat Enterprise Linux 系統管理指南》。
Kickstart Script 的描述式語言

trans-unit.source: Tip: Leave this field blank to use the install-time shell as language for your post script.
trans-unit.target: 提示：將這欄位留白，可以使用安裝時的主控台，作為您 post script 的語言。

trans-unit.source: Enable this to enable templating on this script using cobbler.
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項以透過使用 cobbler 來在此 script 上啟用範本功能。

trans-unit.source: Tip: This specifies when the script gets ran (before or after kickstart).
trans-unit.target: 提示：這會指定 script 的執行時間（kickstart 之前或之後）。

trans-unit.source: You can edit the post script for this kickstart below. First, commands related to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ will automatically be performed (for example, esystem registration to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@). Next, the non-chroot post script will be executed, and finally the post script will be executed. For more details on kickstart post scripts, please refer to the Red Hat Enterprise Linux System Administration Guide.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在下方編輯此 kickstart 的 post script。首先，與 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 相關的指令會自動執行（舉例來說，使用 esystem 向 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 註冊）。接下來，非 chroot 的 post script 會被執行，最後是 post script。如欲取得更多有關於 kickstart post script 的詳細資料，請參閱《Red Hat Enterprise Linux 系統管理指南》。

trans-unit.source: Tip: This script is run in the chroot environment.
trans-unit.target: 提示：這個 script 會在 chroot 環境中運行。
Kickstart 的 Post Script 之詳細資料
Kickstart Post script 的描述式語言

trans-unit.source: "Non-chroot" post-kickstart scripts are run outside of the chroot environment. You can use them to perform tasks that aren't allowed in chroot environments, such as copying scripts or RPMs from installation media.
trans-unit.target: 「非 chroot」post-kickstart script 會在非 chroot 環境中運行。您可以用此來進行一些不允許在 chroot 環境中的工作，例如從安裝媒介複製 script 或 RPM 檔。
非 chroot 的 Post Script 內容

trans-unit.source: Specify below the packages and package groups you'd like to install on systems during kickstart. Please list packages and groups one per line. For more information please see The Red Hat Enterprise Linux System Administration Guide. If you would prefer to specify packages to be installed by package profile sync, please visit the Package Profiles tab to change the kickstart software installation method.
trans-unit.target: 以下指出您想要在 kickstart 過程中安裝到系統上的套件與套件組。每一行代表一個套件或套件組。欲知更多詳情，請參閱《Red Hat Enterprise Linux 系統管理指南》。如果您希望將套件指定為由套件設定檔同步，請參閱 套件設定檔 分頁來改變 kickstart 的軟體安裝方法。

trans-unit.source: Note: only packages available in your Enterprise Linux install tree should be specified here. To install packages available in @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ software channels, please associate an appropriate activation key with this kickstart profile in the Activation Keys tab.
trans-unit.target: 注意：只有在您 Enterprise Linux 安裝樹中的套件，才可以在此指定。要安裝 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 軟體頻道中的套件，請在啟動金鑰分頁中，將適當的啟動金鑰與此 kickstart 設定檔相連結。

trans-unit.source: Install Packages by Package Name and Group
trans-unit.target: 藉由套件名稱與群組來安裝套件

trans-unit.source: Use kickstart snippets to store common blocks of code that can be shared across multiple kickstart profiles in @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. When you create a kickstart snippet, all kickstart profiles including that snippet will be updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 使用 kickstart snippet 來儲存某個可共享於 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 中多個 kickstart 設定檔之間的通用程式碼區塊。當您建立一個 kickstart snippet 時，所有 kickstart 設定檔，包括該 snippet 都會被相應地更新。

trans-unit.source: Default kickstart snippets are not editable.
trans-unit.target: 預設的 kickstart snippet 無法被編輯。

trans-unit.source: Copy and paste the snippet macro into your kickstart profiles to make the full snippet appear in that kickstart profile.
trans-unit.target: 請複製 snippet 巨集並將其貼入您的 kickstart 設定檔中來使完整的 snippet 出現在該 kickstart 設定檔中。

trans-unit.source: Changing this snippet's name will require updating any kickstart profiles that refer to it so that they can continue to access the content of this snippet.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改此 snippet 的名稱，您需要更新任何參照它的 kickstart 設定檔，如此一來它們才可繼續存取此 snippet 的內容。

trans-unit.source: This is where the snippet resides on the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ file system.
trans-unit.target: 此位置為 snippet 在 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 檔案系統上駐留的位置。

trans-unit.source: Custom kickstart snippets will be only available to the {0} organization.
trans-unit.target: 只有 {0} 組織可使用自訂的 kickstart snippet。

trans-unit.source: Default kickstart snippets are available to all organizations. These snippets cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 所有組織都可使用預設的 kickstart snippet。這些 snippet 無法被修改。

trans-unit.source: Snippets can be shared between kickstart profiles
trans-unit.target: Snippet 可共享於 kickstart 設定檔之間

trans-unit.source: The snippet name is the name of a file that will reside in this organization's snippet directory. Any standard unix file name characters are acceptable. Snippet names containing slash character or snippet names beginning with period are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Snippet 的名稱為將會是駐存於此組織的 snippet 目錄中的檔案之名稱。任何標準的 unix 檔案名稱字元都可被接受。Snippet 名稱不可包含斜線字元或是以句號作為起始。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this snippet permanently?
trans-unit.target: 您確定要永久刪除此 snippet 嗎？

trans-unit.source: Deleting this snippet will affect any kickstart profiles that refer to it. It may break those kickstart profiles. We recommend ensuring that no kickstart profiles rely on this snippet before deleting it.
trans-unit.target: 刪除此 snippet 將會影響所有參照它的 kickstart 設定檔。這可能會損毀 kickstart 設定檔。我們建議您在刪除此 snippet 之前先確認沒有任何依賴它的 kickstart 設定檔。

trans-unit.source: No lists are currently enabled on the "Overview" page. You can change this at Overview > Your Preferences > "Overview" Start Page.
trans-unit.target: 在「總覽」網頁上，沒有目前已啟用的清單。您可以從總覽 > 您的偏好設定 >「總覽」起始頁 來改變這一點。

您的系統皆不處於臨界狀態中。

trans-unit.source:
No recently registered systems.

You have no systems that were registered within the past 30 days. You may view a list of all registered systems at Systems > Recently Registered.
trans-unit.target:
沒有近期註冊的系統。

您沒有最近 30 天內註冊的系統。您能由 系統 > 近期註冊.

trans-unit.source:
No inactive systems.

All of your systems are actively checking into @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ at this time. You can view a list of all of your systems at Systems > All.
trans-unit.target:
沒有非運作中的系統。

您所有的系統都正登入 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@。您可以透過 系統 > 全部來檢視您所有系統的清單。

trans-unit.source:
No relevant security errata.

There are no security errata that apply to your systems. You can view a list of all errata for the software your organization has entitlements to at Errata > All.
trans-unit.target:
沒有相關的安全性勘誤。

沒有可以套用到系統的安全性勘誤。您可以檢視組織有權利使用的所有勘誤之清單，網址是勘誤 > 所有。

trans-unit.source: You can also download ISO images of channel content on the Download Software page.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以從 下載軟體 網頁來下載頻道內容的 ISO 映像檔。

trans-unit.source: The following software channels are owned by your organization.

trans-unit.source: Modifying the following options is often useful to troubleshoot hardware problems:
trans-unit.target: 修改以下選項通常能幫助您排除硬體方面的問題：

trans-unit.source: The ELILO bootloader is required for IA-64 systems.
trans-unit.target: ELILO 開機啟動程式只能在 IA-64 系統上運作。
紀錄非 chroot 的 post script 動作
在 up2date/yum 中啟用除錯

trans-unit.source: LILO is a text-based bootloader. Choose LILO as your bootloader if you are having video card issues.
trans-unit.target: LILO 是文字介面的開機啟動程式。如果您有顯示卡方面的問題，請選擇 LILO 為您的開機啟動程式。
額外的 kernel 參數（只對應於自動的 kickstart）

trans-unit.source: You can modify the following options to specify Locale options:
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改以下選項，指定「地區」選項：
步驟一：建立 Kickstart 設定檔
步驟二：發行套件的檔案位置

trans-unit.source: A kickstart file is a simple text file containing a list of items, each identified by a keyword, that answers the questions an installer needs in order to successfully install Red Hat Enterprise Linux. A kickstart profile includes a kickstart file, as well as other saved options such as the version of Red Hat Enterprise Linux to be installed and the location of the installation files.
trans-unit.target: Kickstart 檔案是個簡單的文字檔，包含多個項目，每一行都以一個關鍵字標出，用來回答安裝程式的問題，好成功地安裝 Red Hat Enterprise Linux。Kickstart 設定檔包含了 kickstart 檔案，以及其他儲存選項，例如要安裝的 Red Hat Enterprise Linux 版本，以及安裝檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: Tip: To associate Child software channels with this profile, Please visit the Software > Child Channels tab after you finish these profile creation steps.
trans-unit.target: 提示：如要將子軟體頻道和此設定檔相聯，請在您完成這些設定檔建立步驟後參閱軟體 > 子頻道分頁。

trans-unit.source: In order to install Red Hat Enterprise Linux during kickstart, the Red Hat Enterprise Linux installation files must be available to the kickstarting system via network connection. You can make these available either via http or ftp.
trans-unit.target: 要在 kickstart 期間安裝 Red Hat Enterprise Linux，使用 kickstart 的系統必須能透過網路，下載 Red Hat Enterprise Linux 的安裝檔案。這可以透過 http 或 ftp 通訊協定來達成。

trans-unit.source: The kickstart profile will need to have a root password for the system(s) to be kickstarted in order to complete the kickstart process.
trans-unit.target: Kickstart 設定檔需要系統的 root 密碼，才可以進行 kickstart 以完成整個過程。
無或 KVM 虛擬化客座

trans-unit.source: Activation Keys are used to register systems. Systems registered with an activation key will inherit the characteristics defined by that key.
trans-unit.target: 啟動金鑰是用來註冊系統用。藉由啟動金鑰註冊的系統會承襲該金鑰所定義的特性。

trans-unit.source: The following activation keys have been created for use by your organization.
trans-unit.target: 以下啟動金鑰已經建立，供您的組織使用。

trans-unit.source: If a universal default activation key is set for your organization, then systems registered to your organization will inherit the properties of that key by default without the need to explicitly specify that key during registration.
trans-unit.target: 如果通用的預設啟動金鑰已設定給您的組織使用，那麼預設上，向您的組織註冊的系統會承襲這金鑰的屬性，在註冊的時候，不需要特別指定這金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Click on the description above to view the details for this key.
trans-unit.target: 請按以上的描述，檢視這金鑰的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Use this to describe what kind of settings this key will reflect on systems that use it. If left blank, this field will be filled in '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 使用這功能來描述這金鑰將反映哪些設定至使用該金鑰的系統。如果留白的話，這欄位將會以「{0}」填入。

trans-unit.source: {0} key(s) were enabled and {1} key(s) were disabled.
trans-unit.target: {0} 組金鑰已經啟用；{1} 組金鑰已經停用。

trans-unit.source: You do not currently have a universal default activation key set. To set a key as the universal default, please visit the details page of that key and check off the 'Universal Default?' checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 您目前沒有通用的預設金鑰組。要將一組金鑰設定為通用的預設金鑰，請參閱該金鑰的詳細資料頁面，然後勾選「通用預設」選項。

trans-unit.source: This key is your organization's universal default activation key.
trans-unit.target: 這金鑰是您組織的通用預設啟動金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Systems registered with this activation key will inherit the settings listed below.
trans-unit.target: 以這金鑰註冊的系統會承襲以下列出的設定。

trans-unit.source: Systems registered with this activation key will inherit the settings listed below.
trans-unit.target: 以這金鑰註冊的系統會承襲以下列出的設定。

trans-unit.source: Leave blank for automatic key generation. Note that the prefix is an indication of the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ organization the key is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 若要自動產生金鑰，請保留為空白。請注意前綴字元表示的是與此金鑰相關的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 組織。

trans-unit.source: Choose "{0}" to allow systems to register to the default Red Hat provided channel that corresponds to their installed version of Red Hat Enterprise Linux. You may also choose particular Red Hat provided channels or custom base channels here, but please note if a system using this key is not compatible with the selected channel, it will fall back to its Red Hat default channel.
trans-unit.target: 請選擇「{0}」好讓系統註冊預設的、Red Hat 所提供的、同時與所安裝的 Red Hat Enterprise Linux 版本相對應的頻道。您也可以在此選擇特定的、Red Hat 所提供的頻道或自訂頻道，但請注意，如果一台使用這金鑰的系統並不與所選的頻道相容，它將會回到預設的 Red Hat 頻道。

trans-unit.source: Only one universal default activation key may be set for this organization. By setting this key as universal default, you will remove universal default status from the current universal default key if it exists. If this key is set as universal default, then newly-registered systems to your organization will inherit the properties of this key.
trans-unit.target: 只有一組通用的預設啟動金鑰可以給這個組織拿來設定用。將這金鑰設定為通用預設金鑰，會移除目前（如果有的話）通用預設金鑰的狀態。如果這金鑰設定為通用預設值，那麼您組織的新產生系統將會繼承這金鑰的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you modify the key itself above, please note that the key will be prepended with a '{0}'. This is to identify the organization with which the key is associated and is associated with the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@'s multiple organizations feature.
trans-unit.target: 如果您直接修改了以上金鑰，請注意此金鑰的前方會加上一個「{0}」。這是用來辨認組織是與哪一組金鑰相關聯，並與 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 的多個組織功能相關聯用的。

trans-unit.source: Are you certain you want to delete this key? Activation Keys cannot be recovered once they have been deleted. (Note: A key can be disabled on the key list page, which prevents it from being used, but preserves it for later use.)
trans-unit.target: 確定要刪除這金鑰嗎？啟動金鑰一旦被刪除，就無法還原。（請注意：金鑰可以在金鑰清單頁停用，以防止被人使用，但又可以保留以待日後他用。）

trans-unit.source: Deploy configuration files to systems when they are registered with this activation key.
trans-unit.target: 當配置檔案註冊至此啟動金鑰時，將其建置至系統。

trans-unit.source: Any system registered with this activation key will have the packages listed below installed, if those packages are available. trans-unit.target: 無配置頻道。如要將此啟用金鑰訂閱至一個配置頻道，請閱覽 訂閱頻道 的分頁。

trans-unit.source:
The following configuration files are associated with the systems in this set. You can select files and compare the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@-managed versions of the files to the versions of the files on the systems in your set.

The comparisons for each system will not complete until each system checks in to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. Once each comparison is complete, any differences between the files will be accessible from each system's events page.
trans-unit.target:
下列配置檔案與此叢集中的系統相聯。您能夠選擇檔案，並拿這些檔案的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 所管理的版本與您叢集中的版本做比較。

直到各個系統登錄至 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 中，各個系統之間的比較才能完成。一旦所有的比較都完成時，檔案之間的任何差異就能由各個系統中的事件頁面中存取。

trans-unit.source: Below are available configuration channels to which you may subscribe systems. After selecting the channels to which you wish to subscribe, you will be given a chance to rank those channels. No changes will be made to your system set until after you have ranked channels.
trans-unit.target: 下列為系統可訂閱至的配置頻道。在選擇了您希望訂閱的頻道之後，您會擁有機會將這些頻道分等。在您將這些頻道分等之前，您的系統不會產生任何變更。
步驟 1：選擇欲訂閱的頻道。

trans-unit.source: You must select at least one configuration channel in order to continue.
trans-unit.target: 您必須選擇至少一個配置頻道之後才能繼續。

trans-unit.source: Rank the new configuration channel subscriptions. Configuration files in channels appearing higher in the list will override configuration files with the same path in lower channels. Choose a channel in the list and then use the up and down arrows to change its priority. Also select what priority the configuration channels listed here will have in relation to current configuration channel subscriptions for each system.
trans-unit.target: 將新的配置頻道訂閱分等。等級較高的頻道中的配置檔案會將相同路徑不過位於等級較低的頻道中的配置檔案置換掉。請於清單中選擇一個頻道然後使用上下鍵來更改它的優先權。同時請選擇列在此的配置頻道擁有的優先權和各個系統目前訂閱的配置頻道有何關係。
步驟 2：為訂閱的頻道分等。

trans-unit.target: 所有的配置頻道都會按照以下所出現的順序被訂閱為最低的位置。以下列出的其中一個系統與頻道之間的任何現存訂閱都會被取代，這樣的話它就會出現在一個新的位置上。所有其它現存的訂閱都會保留在它們目前的位置上。

trans-unit.source: Locally-managed configuration files are useful for overriding centrally-managed configuration profiles that cause problems on particular systems. trans-unit.source:
The following details are needed to define a kickstartable distribution. The tree path field should be a valid path to a installation tree located on this @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ server. The Kickstart RPM should be the name of the rpm containing the kickstart deploy scripts. These RPMs are provided by @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ and located in the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Tools child channels.

The Distribution Label field should contain only letters, numbers, hyphens, periods, and underscores. It must also be at least 4 characters long.

The Tree Path, Kickstart RPM, Base Channel, and Installer Generation should always match. This generally means that the versions for each field should be from the same version of Red Hat Enterprise Linux.

The Tree Path must be a local disk path on your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ server containing the entire kickstart tree for a distribution include kernel, initrd, and repo information, but excluding any rpms. This directory should be readable by the apache and tomcat users. From within the specified tree path, a kernel should be available at "./images/pxeboot/vmlinuz" and an initrd image should be available at "./images/pxeboot/initrd.img". For instance, if you have media located on the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ server at: /var/distro-trees/rhel-5-server/ you would specify that path as your Tree Path value which would check for a kernel and initrd here: /var/distro-trees/rhel-5-server/images/pxeboot/
trans-unit.target:
若要定義可 kickstart 的發行套件，您將需要以下詳細資料。「目錄樹路徑（Tree Path）」這個欄位應該是個位於此 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 伺服器上的安裝樹的有效路徑。Kickstart RPM 應是包含著 kickstart 建置 script 的 rpm 的名稱。這些 RPM 檔案都由 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 所提供，並位於「@@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 工具」子頻道中。

「發行套件標籤（Distribution Label）」欄位僅能包含文數字、減號、句號與底線。並且它至少需包含四個字元。

「目錄樹路徑」、「Kickstart RPM」、「基礎頻道」與「安裝程式產生器」應該要保持一致。這通常表示每個欄位的版本都應該來自於相同的 Red Hat Enterprise Linux 版本。

目錄樹路徑必須是您 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 伺服器上的本地磁碟路徑，並且包含著套件發行版的整個 kickstart 樹，這包括了 kernel、initrd 和 repo 資訊，不過卻排除所有 rpm。此目錄必須要能讓 apache 和 tomcat 的用戶讀取。由指定的目錄樹路徑中，kernel 應該位於「./images/pxeboot/vmlinuz」並且應有個 initrd 映像檔位於「./images/pxeboot/initrd.img」。比方說，若您有媒介位於 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 伺服器上：/var/distro-trees/rhel-5-server/ 您將需要指定該路徑為您的目錄樹路徑值，如此一來系統便會在此檢查是否有 kernel 和 initrd：/var/distro-trees/rhel-5-server/images/pxeboot/

trans-unit.source: Our highest priority is your access to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ and the advantages of a registered account. We strive to maintain 100% uptime for your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ service, but must also periodically perform maintenance tasks to upgrade functionality, fix reported bugs, and improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 我們的首要目標就是讓您存取 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@，以享用 註冊用戶專屬的好處。我們希望能提供您廿四小時的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服務，儘管如此我們還是得進行定期維護工作 以升級一些功能、修正錯誤、和改善 效能。

trans-unit.source: Red Hat schedules all planned maintenance to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ each Tuesday from 9pm-3am, Eastern U.S. Time (1am-7am UTC). While Red Hat will not necessarily use every one of these windows to perform maintenance, we recommend that your enterprise develop business practices that allow this period of downtime for your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ solution. Red Hat will always attempt to inform at least one week in advance through the email outage list (see below) about this scheduled downtime whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: Red Hat 會在美東時間的周二 晚間九點至隔日凌晨三點（凌晨一點至凌晨七點 UTC）對 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 進行維護。但 Red Hat 不一定 會每週都進行維護；但我們建議您 在設計 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 相關時程時，避開這個時段。 Red Hat 會盡可能提前一週寄出電子郵件（如下）通知 您這段排程的站務維護時間。

trans-unit.source: Unscheduled maintenance windows are possible, but rare. Red Hat Network will attempt notification, again through the email outage list (see below), at least 12 hours or as soon as possible in advance of unscheduled maintenance.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會遇到未排程的維護時段；但這很罕見。Red Hat Network 會儘可能提前十二小時，以電子郵件通知您這些未排程的維護時段。

trans-unit.source: When failing equipment or any other critical issue forces an outage, Red Hat will open a trouble ticket on the outage and contact all users on the email outage list as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: 當裝備問題或其他重大事故發生，導致必須停機時，Red Hat 會紀錄、追蹤此項停機事 件，並立即透過停機電子郵件清單，與所有使用者聯絡。

trans-unit.source: All @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ users are encouraged to join our optional email outage list. 下載以及使用 ISO 映像檔

trans-unit.source:
It is recommended that you use curl to download the ISO images. If you use @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ and don't currently have curl, you may install it by running the command "up2date curl" (Enterprise Linux 4 and below) or "yum curl" (Enterprise Linux 5 and above) from a shell prompt.

Once curl is installed, at a shell prompt, cut and paste the URL for the ISO into the curl command as follows:

[user@localhost home]$ curl -C - -O 'very_long_url'

Use the following curl command to save the ISO as 'myfilename.iso':

[user@localhost home]$ curl -C - -o 'myfilename.iso' 'very_long_url'

The URL is very long because it contains session authentication information. Be sure to include the single quotation marks. The '-C -' option allows you to continue the download if it is interrupted (for example, in case you lose the connection). The '-O' (the letter 'O', not a zero) option will save the file with same name as on the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ servers.

You may also use wget to obtain the ISO files. If you use @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ and don't currently have wget, you may install it by running "up2date wget" (Enterprise Linux 4 and below) or "yum wget" (Enterprise Linux 5 and above) from your command line.

Once wget is installed, at a shell prompt, cut and paste the URL for the ISO into the wget command as follows:

[user@localhost home]$ wget -c 'very_long_url'

For more information on how to use Red Hat ISOs, check the How To Download page.
trans-unit.target:
我們建議您使用 curl 來下載 ISO 映像檔。假如您使用 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 但是目前沒有 curl 的話，您能夠藉由從 shell 提示執行「up2date curl」（Enterprise Linux 4 或以下）或「yum curl」（Enterprise Linux 5 或以上）這項指令來安裝它。

一旦 curl 被安裝以後，請將 ISO 的 URL 剪下並貼至 shell 提示中的 curl 指令，就像是：

[user@localhost home]$ curl -C - -O 'very_long_url'

請使用下列 curl 指令來將 ISO 儲存為「myfilename.iso」：

[user@localhost home]$ curl -C - -o 'myfilename.iso' 'very_long_url'

URL 非常長因為它包含著 session 認證資訊。請確認您有加入單獨的引號。「-C -」這個選項能讓您在傳輸中斷時（比方說您斷線時）繼續下載。「-O」（是字母 O 不是零）這個選項能夠將檔案儲存為與 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 伺服器上相同的名稱。<

您也能使用 wget 來取得 ISO 檔案。如果您使用 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 而目前卻沒有 wget 的話，您能夠藉由從您的指令列執行「up2date wget」（Enterprice 4 或以下）或「yum wget」（Enterprise 5 或以上）來安裝它。

一旦 wget 被安裝之後，請將 ISO 的 URL 剪下並貼至 shell 提示中的 wget 指令中，就像是：

[user@localhost home]$ wget -c 'very_long_url'

如要取得更多有關於如何使用 Red Hat ISO 的資訊，請查閱 如何下載

的網頁。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of channel content ISOs: Base Channel Content ISOs and Incremental Channel Content ISOs. You will want to download Base Channel Content ISOs if you need to initially populate a new @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ with channel content. Alternatively, you will want to download Incremental Channel Content ISOs if you want to update channels that you have already imported into your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種頻道內容 ISO：基礎頻道 ISO 與遞增頻道內容 ISO。 假如您一開始需要將一個新的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 集結於頻道內容，您將需要下載基礎頻道內容的 ISO。 另外地，如果您希望更新您已匯入 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 中的頻道，您便需下載遞增頻道內容的 ISO。

trans-unit.source: Note: Additional documentation on using @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Channel Content ISOs is available in the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Installation Guide, section 6.2.2.
trans-unit.target: 請注意：有關於 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 頻道內容 ISO 使用上的額外文件能由 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 安裝指南中的章節 6.2.2. 取得。

trans-unit.source: Note: FasTrack and Beta software channels are intended as early access options for new software releases. This is why they are not compatible with Extended Update Support, which is meant to keep a particular system compatible with a particular previous software release.

trans-unit.source:
As a Channel Administrator, you may change the base channels your systems are subscribed to. Valid channels are either channels created by your organization, or the default Red Hat base channel for your operating system version and processor type. Systems will be unsubscribed from all channels, and subscribed to their new base channels.

This operation can have a dramatic effect on the packages and errata available to the systems, and should be used with caution.
trans-unit.target:
身為頻道管理員，您可以改變系統所訂閱的基礎頻道。合於規定的平到是您組織所建立的頻道，或是與您的作業系統版本與處理器類型相符預設的 Red Hat 基礎頻道。系統將取消訂閱所有頻道，然後訂閱新的基礎頻道。

這動作會對系統上的套件與勘誤有著巨大的影響，請小心使用。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you wish to delete this channel? Packages in the channel will be removed from the channel, but will remain on the server. You will be given the option to delete them after the channel has been deleted. Errata related to the channel will no longer be related to the channel, and may be orphaned. If the channel has child channels, it cannot be deleted; the child channels must be deleted first. If the channel has kickstart distributions associated to it, it cannot be deleted; the kickstart distributions must be dissociated from the channel or deleted first.
Channel deletion will affect any Trusted Organizations that have systems subscribed to the {0} channel.

Create or edit software channels from this page. <p/> If the parent channel is set to 'none', the channel is a base channel. Otherwise, the channel is a child of the specified channel. <p/> Channel name and label are required. They each must be at least 6 characters in length. Labels must begin with a letter, contain only lowercase letters, hyphens ('-'), periods ('.'), underscores ('_'), and numerals. Channel name may also contain spaces and forward slashes ('/'). <p/> Channel summary is also required.
trans-unit.target: 請由此網頁建立或編輯軟體頻道。 <p/> 若父頻道被設為「none」的話，頻道就會是基礎頻道。 否則，頻道將會是個特定頻道的子頻道。 <p/> 需要頻道名稱和標籤。它們的長度至少必須為 6 個 字元。標籤必須以一個字母作為起始，並且只包含 小寫字母、連字符號（「-」）、句號（「.」）、下劃線（「_」）以及 數字。頻道名稱也能包含空格和正斜線 （「/」）。 <p/> 頻道摘要也是必要的。
